column5: Hello everyone I'm new to central Ontario and my wife and I are looking for a good small walleye lake
The Kawarthas hold some decent walleye..  But you aren't going to be getting specifics from anyone about a small walleye lake, I can tell you that.
Grab a map and throw a dart ! It's how I choose my lakes to fly into !
Maybe mention a town near where you live and someone might mention a decent lake nearby. Central Ontario covers a lot of area but walleye are found in most places.
Central Ontario is devoid of life...move north
